overview: Mark Belanger owns all things technical at Fluid. Server-side and client-side software development to network. Systems architecture. Our internal technical team. In day-to-day company management he is essential. Mark’s camper van has full Internet access. Need we say anything else? Mark brings 10 years of Internet development experience to the table. He and his team are integral to all of Fluid’s projects. The details on the server-side: Java. C/C++. Perl. PHP. RDBMS. Application Servers. Network architecture. Wireless deployment. Systems design. On the client-side: Dynamic HTML. JavaScript. CSS. Flash and multimedia technologies. A list that allows our clients to succeed. Not on the list? It’s highly likely he can make it happen.
